document_data.name: Shalandain
document_data.mainbody: '''Shalandain''' was a [[human]] [[paladin]] [[crusader]] member of the do-gooder group called the [[Company of the Chalice]] based on the [[Rock of Bral]] in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Shalandain wore a powerful magical ''+3'' [[field plate]], a ''+5'' ''[[holy avenger]]'' [[long sword]] and a mundane [[shield]]. Other [[enchanted]] items of hers included ''[[boots of starstriding]]'' and ''[[potions of flying]]''.
document_data.History: Shalandain belonged to a band of heroes who reverted to good and hunted down evil – the Company of the Chalice. Shalandain was the second-in-command of the group's Rock of Bral base that focused on crusades against the [[neogi]].
